alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 01 at 9:04AM PST until December 03 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. For the high mountains of Northern Elko county and the Ruby Mountains above 7000 feet, expect an additional 1-3 feet of snow, with locally higher amounts, through Sunday morning. Valleys below 6500 feet will see amounts ranging from a dusting to 5 inches through Sunday morning. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph in the highest terrain. * WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...Through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
